alert.note: Alert for St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 10:56PM CDT until April 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LEE AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. FRANCIS COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palestine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Madison, Widener, Haynes, New Home, Brickeys, Rawlinson, Whitmore, Raggio, Cody, Gassett, Kokomo, Dansby, Soudan, Burnt Cane, Round Pond, Blackfish, Heustess, Ball Point and Tongin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
